original: apply compose2_4IsPR with (f1 := fun n _ : nat => n) (f2 := fun _ _ : nat => Init.Nat.pred) (f3 := fun n _ : nat => cPairPi1 n) (f4 := fun n _ : nat => cPairPi2 n) (g := fun p fn n _ : nat => switchPR p (switchPR (charFunction 2 Nat.eqb fn n) 1 (codeNth (p - S n))) 0). - apply pi1_2IsPR. - apply filter10IsPR. apply Prelude.predIsPR. - apply compose2_2IsPR with (f := cPairPi1) (g := cPair) (h := Init.Nat.sub). ++ apply cPairPi1IsPR. ++ apply cPairIsPR. ++ apply Init.Nat.sub_isPR. - apply compose2_2IsPR with (f := cPairPi2) (g := cPair) (h := Init.Nat.sub). ++ apply cPairPi2IsPR. ++ apply cPairIsPR. ++ apply Init.Nat.sub_isPR. - apply swapIsPR. apply compose2_3IsPR with (f1 := switchPR) (f2 := charFunction 2 Nat.eqb) (f3 := fun _ _ : nat => id) (g := fun sw char id0 : nat => switchPR sw char id0). ++ apply switchPR_isPR. ++ apply compose2_3IsPR with (f1 := pi1_3IsPR) (f2 := eqIsPR) (f3 := pi3_4IsPR) (g := charFunction 2 Nat.eqb). -- apply pi1_3IsPR. -- apply eqIsPR. -- apply pi3_4IsPR. ++ apply filter110IsPR. apply switchPR_isPR.
